sections.heading: Appeal; procedure.Any person aggrieved by final action of the secretary under the Licensing of Truth and Deception Examiners Act may appeal the final action, and such appeal shall be in accordance with the Administrative Procedure Act
sections.text: SourceLaws 1980, LB 485, ยง 31;Laws 1988, LB 352, ยง 181.Cross Refe
